title: Temple of Claudius
description: A large classical-style Roman temple built shortly after the conquest of Britannia in AD 43 by the emperor Claudius. Its remains lie beneath Colchester Castle.

properties.description: Location of the temple of Claudius at Camulodunum (Colchester), based on satellite imagery.
properties.title: Imagery location for Temple of Claudius, Camulodunum
